verses.verse: And Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> took <WH3947> either <WH376> of them his censer, <WH4289> and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein, <WH2004> and put <WH7760> incense <WH7004> thereon, <WH5921> and offered <WH7126> strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> them not.
And there went <WH3318> out fire <WH784> from the LORD, <WH3068> and devoured <WH398> them, and they died <WH4191> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

Then Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> This <WH1931> is it that the LORD <WH3068> spoke, <WH1696> saying, <WH559> I will be sanctified <WH6942> in them that come <WH7138> near <WH7138> me, and before <WH5921> <WH6440> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> I will be glorified. <WH3513> And Aaron <WH175> held <WH1826> his peace. <WH1826>

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Mishael <WH4332> and Elzaphan, <WH469> the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816> the uncle <WH1730> of Aaron, <WH175> and said <WH559> to them, Come <WH7126> near, <WH7126> carry <WH5375> your brothers <WH251> from before <WH6440> the sanctuary <WH6944> out of the camp. <WH4264>
So they went <WH7126> near, <WH7126> and carried <WH5375> them in their coats <WH3801> out of the camp; <WH4264> as Moses <WH4872> had said. <WH1696>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> and to Eleazar <WH499> and to Ithamar, <WH385> his sons, <WH1121> Uncover <WH6544> not your heads, <WH7218> neither <WH3808> rend <WH6533> your clothes; <WH899> lest <WH3808> you die, <WH4191> and lest wrath <WH7107> come on all <WH3605> the people: <WH5712> but let your brothers, <WH251> the whole <WH3605> house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> mourn <WH1058> the burning <WH8316> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> has kindled. <WH8313>

And you shall not go <WH3318> out from the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> lest <WH6435> you die: <WH4191> for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> of the LORD <WH3068> is on you. And they did <WH6213> according to the word <WH1697> of Moses. <WH4872>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

Do not drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196> nor strong drink, <WH7941> you, nor your sons <WH1121> with you, when you go <WH935> into <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> lest <WH3808> you die: <WH4191> it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations: <WH1755>
And that you may put difference <WH914> between <WH996> holy <WH6944> and unholy, <WH2455> and between <WH996> unclean <WH2931> and clean; <WH2889>

And that you may teach <WH3384> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> all <WH3605> the statutes <WH2706> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> has spoken <WH1696> to them by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> to Aaron, <WH175> and to Eleazar <WH499> and to Ithamar, <WH385> his sons <WH1121> that were left, <WH3498> Take <WH3947> the meat offering <WH4503> that remains <WH3498> of the offerings of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire, and eat <WH398> it without <WH4682> leaven <WH4682> beside <WH681> the altar: <WH4196> for it is most <WH6944> holy: <WH6944>

And you shall eat <WH398> it in the holy <WH6918> place, <WH4725> because <WH3588> it is your due, <WH2706> and your sons' <WH1121> due, <WH2706> of the sacrifices of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire: for so <WH3651> I am commanded. <WH6680>

And the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> shall you eat <WH398> in a clean <WH2889> place; <WH4725> you, and your sons, <WH1121> and your daughters <WH1323> with you: for they be your due, <WH2706> and your sons' <WH1121> due, <WH2706> which are given <WH5414> out of the sacrifices <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

The heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> and the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> shall they bring <WH935> with the offerings made by fire of the fat, <WH2459> to wave <WH5130> it for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> and it shall be yours, and your sons' <WH1121> with you, by a statute <WH2706> for ever; <WH5769> as the LORD <WH3068> has commanded. <WH6680>

And Moses <WH4872> diligently sought <WH1875> the goat <WH8163> of the sin <WH2403> offering, and, behold, <WH2009> it was burnt: <WH8313> and he was angry <WH7107> with Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar, <WH385> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> which were left <WH3498> alive, saying, <WH559>

Why <WH4069> have you not eaten <WH398> the sin <WH2403> offering in the holy <WH6944> place, <WH4725> seeing <WH3588> it is most <WH6944> holy, <WH6944> and God has given <WH5414> it you to bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the congregation, <WH5712> to make atonement <WH3722> for them before <WH6440> the LORD?

Behold, <WH2005> the blood <WH1818> of it was not brought <WH935> in within <WH6441> the holy <WH6944> place: you should indeed have eaten <WH398> it in the holy <WH6944> place, as I commanded. <WH6680>

And Aaron <WH175> said <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> Behold, <WH2005> this day <WH3117> have they offered <WH7126> their sin <WH2403> offering and their burnt <WH5930> offering before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> and such <WH428> things have befallen <WH7122> me: and if I had eaten <WH398> the sin <WH2403> offering to day, <WH3117> should it have been accepted <WH3190> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD? <WH3068>
And when Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> that, he was content. <WH3190>
